summary: Alchemy shops are seriously understocked with potions and poisons.  This mod changes the level lists so all potions and poisons that are normally for sale are always for sale and in much larger quantities.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
        LFox Alchemists Have Potions and Poisons v1.01
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. INSTALLING THE PLUGIN

*****************************************************************

1. Extract the mod to the Data folder and enable it via the
launcher or mod manager.

*****************************************************************

     2. Mod Load Order

*****************************************************************

This plugin should be fine anywhere in your load order.  It will
be incompatible with anything that modifies the potion
leveled list for alchemy shops.

*****************************************************************

     3. Mod Description

*****************************************************************

Alchemy shops are seriously understocked with potions and
poisons.  This mod changes the level lists so all potions and
poisons that are normally for sale are always for sale and in
much larger quantities.

Enable only one.

LFox Alchemists Have Potions and Poisons.esp
Improves stock on Potions and Poisons.

LFox Alchemists Have Potions.esp
Improves stock on only Potions.

LFox Alchemists Have Poisons.esp
Improves stock on only Poisons.

NOTE: Do not ask for lower quantities.  Each vendor chest
contains multiple copies of the leveled lists.  To lower it any
further i\'d need to edit all the chests themselves which i am
not doing.

*****************************************************************

     4. Version History

*****************************************************************

v1.01
- Added two new variations.

v1.0
- Made the plugin
author: LFox
